--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Serizawa Kamo <serizawakamo@y...> wrote:
> >    From: shinsengumi3@a...
> 
> I have the first four volumes of it. Actually, the
> name of the manga is "Getsumei Seiki" ("tsuki akiraka
> ni hoshi mare naki"), and the subtitle is "sayonara
> Shinsengumi". Currently being published in Young
> Sunday.


That's Kamo-san all over.
Kamo-san already knew this Manga.^^  sasugada.... 

Did Kamo-san read this Manga, after coming to Japan? 
After coming to Japan, did you read some books of Shinsengumi? 

Kamo-san no kotodakara iroiro yondeisou....
"PAPUWA" toka "Gintama" toka made shitteitara watashi wa
kanari odoroki masu.^^



> (seen also in Bakumatsu Fuunroku Makoto),

Oh, did you also read this? 
Is this Manga which Koudansya published? 
In fact, I am not reading this Manga.
Is this interesting? 



I think that "Getsumeiseiki" has set up Kondou's character very 
well. 
Other Shinsengumi works value Hijikata and Okita and recognize 
Kondou's existence small in many cases. 
Especially Manga has many the tendencies. 
If Kondou's charisma character cannot be expressed, it becomes 
impossible to explain Hijikata's action.
I think that this will be an important setup if Hijikata is made 
into the main character. 
And I think that almost all Shinsengumi Manga has gone wrong in this 
point. 

There is assassination of Serizawa in the 5th volume. 
I have not seen Serizawa sadder than this Manga. 
 
The episode of Ikedaya started with the magazine (Young Sunday). 
Masuya was arrested by Shinsengumi this week. 




By the way, although it got cold in Tokyo suddenly, how is Aizu? 
It is better to take care about condition, since it will get cold 
still from now on. 


momoiro-usagi
